result.reason: Fullscreen RDP connections display at understated resolution, likely due to DPI scaling not being applied when setting DesktopWidth/DesktopHeight before the control knows the actual monitor dimensions.
result.approach: When entering fullscreen, query the actual monitor bounds via Screen.FromControl() and apply DPI scale factor to DesktopWidth/DesktopHeight before or after the fullscreen transition; ensure the resolution is refreshed on the Resize event when fullscreen is active.
